languages.text: "Дай мне причину и дальше слушать твои советы и полагаться на суждения. Пока что я ее не вижу".
"Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."
languages.original_text: "Дай мне причину и дальше слушать твои советы и полагаться на суждения. Пока что я ее не вижу".

traits.locale_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgment. Right now I don't see any."
"Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgment. Right now I don't see any."
"Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgment. Right now I don't see any."
"Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

languages.text: “我为什么要继续听从你的建议，相信你的判断？给我个理由吧，因为我现在完全看不到这么做的理由。”
languages.original_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

traits.locale_text: “我为什么要继续听从你的建议，相信你的判断？给我个理由吧，因为我现在完全看不到这么做的理由。”

languages.text: «Deme un motivo para seguir prestando atención a sus consejos y opiniones. Ahora mismo, no veo ninguno».
languages.original_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

traits.locale_text: «Deme un motivo para seguir prestando atención a sus consejos y opiniones. Ahora mismo, no veo ninguno».

languages.text: 「お前の助言に耳を傾け、その判断を信頼し続けなければならない理由を教えてくれ。今のところ、何ひとつ見当たらない」
languages.original_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の助言に耳を傾け、その判断を信頼し続けなければならない理由を教えてくれ。今のところ、何ひとつ見当たらない」

languages.text: "Nennt mir einen Grund, warum ich weiter auf Euren Rat hören und auf Euer Urteil vertrauen sollte. Ich sehe nämlich keinen."
languages.original_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

traits.locale_text: "Nennt mir einen Grund, warum ich weiter auf Euren Rat hören und auf Euer Urteil vertrauen sollte. Ich sehe nämlich keinen."

languages.text: « Donnez-moi une seule bonne raison de continuer à écouter vos conseils et à me fier à votre jugement. Pour ma part, je n'en vois aucune dans l'immédiat. »
languages.original_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

traits.locale_text: « Donnez-moi une seule bonne raison de continuer à écouter vos conseils et à me fier à votre jugement. Pour ma part, je n'en vois aucune dans l'immédiat. »

languages.text: "Senin tavsiyelerine uyup kanaatlerine güvenmem için bir sebep ver bana. An itibarıyla elimde bir sebep yok."
languages.original_text: "Give me a reason why I should continue listening to your advice and trusting your judgement. Right now I don't see any."

traits.locale_text: "Senin tavsiyelerine uyup kanaatlerine güvenmem için bir sebep ver bana. An itibarıyla elimde bir sebep yok."
